channel.title: Blog on LMMs-Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on LMMs-Lab

item.title: Embracing Video Evaluations with LMMs-Eval Upgrades v0.2.0
item.description: We introduce a video evaluation feature to lmms-eval, supporting video model evaluations with over most popular datasets.

item.title: Accelerating the Development of Large Multimodal Models with LMMs-Eval
item.description: One command evaluation API for fast and thorough evaluation of LMMs, providing multi-faceted insights on model performance with over 40 datasets.
